website_summaries.verdict: A simple, but well made bead maze intended for little ones ages 2 to 4. All the quality of similarly sized bead mazes at a fraction of the price.
pros: Size is ideal for on-the-go use or as a high chair distraction
Non-toxic paint is safe for curious toddlers
Large beads are easy to maneuver
Wood and metal construction is tough enough to take some abuse

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly designed for young babies
customer_reviews.text: I really like that the curvature of the wires are gently sloped vs the high frequency sine wave design on others that we own. The wires are well spaced and uncomplicated. This makes it easier for young babies to stick their hands between the different lanes and navigate the wooden beads across the wires with their still relatively clumsy hands. The gentle slopes allow me to rest the beads on them first so that my son can try to slide them down. The suction works really well too, unlike the suction cup on the Sassy Wheel (another beloved chair toy). It fits on our high chair tray, Bumbo seat tray and our Joovy walker tray. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CloudRyder9

customer_reviews.title: WhoopsyDoo Bead Coaster
customer_reviews.text: I gave the toy as a gift to a little boy. He loved it, but one of the dowels that held on one suction cup came off almost immediately. The boy's father tried to remove all the dowels with the suction cups, but they were attached very well. So he used wood glue and re-glued all the suction cups on so that the boy could not remove it. I would ask the manufacturers to use a better glue...so no one could remove these smaller parts and possibly choke on it/them. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Zens

customer_reviews.title: Our son's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for little hands! We put this on our son's high chair tray whenever he is getting fussy. This allows us an extra 10min to finish our dinner--so valuable and 100% worth the money! Good quality wood, wires don't bend (even despite heavy teething) and beads are the perfect size for his tiny hands. He started playing with it at 5months old and this has really helped him develop hand-eye coordination much earlier than others in his same daycare class. Would highly recommend this item to other parents looking for a nice high-quality toy that will stand up to the test of time!
customer_reviews.author: Kari123

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not quite there
customer_reviews.text: The suction on the bottom are nice and works well. The quality is almost there, but on one of the maze the little rounds beads get stuck on the corner. It's not smooth and requires a bit of force to move the beads further on the maze. The home probably needs to be just a couple mm bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but suction cups not the strongest
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high chair toy! My daughter LOVES the beads. However, the suction cups aren't the strongest, so she can easily yank it off (which she does on the regular). Great toy, just expect it to end up on the floor pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made toy for the price. And the auctions at the bottom really keep the toy in place on my glass table. I've had this toy for months, and my now 1.5 year old has yet to really play with it. She just never showed any interest.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl818

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but suction doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of Fat Brain Toys. Their items are high quality and innovative. However, we have yet to find a surface that this toy will suction to.
customer_reviews.author: EmeraldIsleLassie

customer_reviews.title: Great bead coaster!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this!! I love that it suctions yo surfaces and it’s not too big, so we can travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: A great value for the pleasure it gives!
customer_reviews.text: This is my twin grandchildren’s favorite toy. They love it so much that I bought another so that they can each have their own rather than having hurt feelings. The toy is well-made, colorful, and something they can have until they tire of it—whenever that may be.
customer_reviews.author: SML

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, decent size
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, decent size, my kiddo loves it! I do agree with some other reviews that the suction cups aren’t super strong...either that or my kid has super strength I don’t know about:) colors are vibrant and seems to be great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten D.

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups could be better but overall my boys LOVE this! It’s a hit in our house from our 10 month old to our 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 10 month old son. He likes it a lot. The suction cups do not work which is a huge bummer but otherwise it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tayler

customer_reviews.title: Shipping concerns
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my granddaughter. I shipped directly to my daughter. My daughter shared with me it was shipped in the packaging when it's on the shelf. This was upsetting to me since it's not very heavy. It did arrive ok,but could have been trashed.
customer_reviews.author: SLRVUMC

customer_reviews.title: Suction sucks but still a neat toy !
customer_reviews.text: The toy in general is super neat but the reason why I bought was for the suction cups and they suck.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super cute. The suction cups on it are great for a high chair or hard flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it !! Makes feeding time very easy
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what i was looking for. Not to complex , not to big or small , and stays to the high chair tray !
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Weak suction
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups are not strong at all. Kiddo can easily take high chair tray
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great activity toy
customer_reviews.text: Great activity toy. High quality. Stays put on high chair. Easy for 9-month-old grandson to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Fazio

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter gift
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my 9 month old granddaughter. It is the perfect toy to keep her busy while sitting in her high chair. She seems to like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy for young children
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it right out of the box. He loves to play with it. It has lots of interesting shapes and movements.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Reyes Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It is very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who is 17 months old. She really loves it and it keeps her busy and she loves moving the beads around.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Lancial

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups don’t stick.
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy if you don’t want to stick it to anything. The suction cups don’t stick to anything. Bought this fir a high chair toy and my daughter rips it off in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Michael hackett

product_meta.title: Fat Brain Toys Beads Coaster - WhoopsyDoo Bead Coaster Early Learning Toys for Babies
feature_bullets: SPIN, SLIDE, AND EXPLORE! A simple must-have for early tactile exploration
COLORFUL BEADS MESMERIZE as they slide along the winding rails; Suction-cup base holds it in place
PERFECT FOR AGES 2 AND UP; Made of quality wood and metal; Exceptionally sturdy and safe
DEVELOPS FINE MOTOR SKILLS, spatial reasoning; Encourages sensory exploration, cause-effect learning
MEASURES 8.5 x 4.75 x 8.5 INCHES; Frustration-free packaging
